comment: Induction on the upper set of integers that starts at an integer ` M ` , using explicit substitution. The hypotheses are the basis and the induction step. Use this instead of ~ uzind4s when ` j ` and ` k ` must be distinct in ` [. ( k + 1 ) / j ]. ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 16-Nov-2005.)
